title: Downloading really slow
body: Umm am new to this and tryna download this game,but its downloading at an rate of 25/kbs-50 My internets completly fine.Is it a thing the game does? or not cause its really sloww and am very eager to try it out.

replies.body: It's probably best to let that download finish, since interrupting it could mess up some of the game files. If you know that download should be going much faster, we could look over some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if we could make a few adjustments to speed that up!
It's probably downloading small files, that's why. Leave it and let it finish. Should be fine.
